description: Photography and visual guidelines for pet insurance content. The vibe is editorial, fashion-forward, and theatrically comedic.

details: sharp elegant black winged eyeliner, cat-eye effect
perfectly defined lashes, full but natural-looking
soft nude or rose lip with satin finish

lighting.primary_light: soft natural daylight entering from the side, creating gentle rays across the scene
lighting.secondary_light: warm ambient lamp glow adding small highlights and depth

time_of_day_hints.night: soft dim bedside lighting, mixed ambient (room light + subtle laptop glow if saveyourpet.de slide), gentle shadows on face
time_of_day_hints.morning: golden hour warmth, soft window light, elevated cozy mood
time_of_day_hints.neutral: soft indoor lighting, warm-neutral tones, mixed ambient sources

photography.framing: wide view capturing subject and environment, fashion editorial composition
photography.focus: slightly soft overall, matching moody low-light feel but still sharp on subject
photography.color_profile: warm-toned shadows with subtle cool daylight streaks, muted but rich
characteristics: slight wide-angle distortion from phone camera
natural lens reflections in mirror if mirror selfie
critical_rules: NEVER show a phone screen or hold a second phone in the subject's hands
The phone is being used to TAKE the selfie (front camera) - its screen cannot be visible
No second phone should be visible in the scene
Hands should be: gesturing, resting, petting the pet, touching face, etc. (one hand only for selfies)

saveyourpet_slide_exception.description: EXCEPTION: When the slide mentions saveyourpet.de, show the person using the website on a LAPTOP
saveyourpet_slide_exception.concept: Show the person actively USING the saveyourpet.de website on their laptop - larger screen = better brand recognition

execution.reference_image: Use the screenshot at 'server/data/anchors/saveyourpet/website_screenshot_laptop.png' as reference image for the AI
execution.laptop_placement: The AI should place the screenshot onto a laptop screen in front of the person
execution.pose: Person looking at laptop screen, concentrated/browsing, pet nearby (behind laptop, next to them, sleeping on bed)
execution.camera_angle: Over-the-shoulder shot preferred - shows laptop screen clearly while maintaining intimate UGC vibe
setting_suggestions: On bed with laptop, dog sleeping behind the laptop - over-the-shoulder shot
Cozy couch scene, laptop on lap or coffee table, pet curled up next to her
At desk in minimalist apartment, pet visible in background or under desk
On floor with blanket, laptop in front, pet lying nearby

saveyourpet_slide_exception.prompt_template: Over-the-shoulder shot of woman on [LOCATION] looking at laptop screen showing saveyourpet.de [use reference image], [PET] sleeping/lying nearby, [LIGHTING], raw UGC aesthetic, laptop screen clearly visible with website UI
important_notes: ALWAYS use laptop, NEVER phone for saveyourpet.de slides
Laptop screen should take up 25-40% of the image - clearly visible
Over-the-shoulder angle works best for showing screen content
Pet should be visible but not blocking the laptop screen
The screenshot doesn't need to be perfectly readable, just recognizable
Vibe: 'caught researching late at night' - authentic, not staged

skin_and_makeup.skin_texture: ultra-realistic with visible micro-pores, natural oils, realistic highlights
skin_and_makeup.makeup_style: modern fashion aesthetic, elevated but not overdone
details: muted nude or rose lips with satin finish

environment.vibe: authentic German apartment aesthetic, minimalist, functional but stylish
elements: visible pet (cat or dog) in natural position

expressions.tone: self-aware humor, even when text is dramatic

vibe.tone: editorial meets relatable, fashion-forward but approachable
vibe.beauty_aesthetic: naturally gorgeous, the kind of girl who looks effortlessly beautiful even being dramatic about her pet

restrictions.content: strictly non-sexual; all curves and shadows interpreted as natural posture and lighting only
restrictions.accuracy: must match editorial fashion mood while feeling authentic
avoid: phone/smartphone visible in hands or any phone screen showing (the phone is taking the photo!)
car interiors (not on-brand for German pet owner)
perfectly smooth/plastic 'AI' skin (ALWAYS use visible pores and skin texture)
couple shots or other people (only the girl + her pet)
